description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows DNS information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-21377), it is critical to apply the appropriate update for your Windows build:

1. Identify your Windows version and build number using 'winver' command.
2. Download and install the relevant KB update from the links provided below:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
   - For windows 10 for 32-bit Systems: [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)

**Details**:
The updates provided will mitigate the risk of information disclosure associated with the Windows DNS server. Ensure your system is fully updated to protect against this issue. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that you have administrative privileges.
- Backup your data before proceeding with the installation to avoid any data loss in case of unforeseen circumstances.
